author: Fextralife
description:
Nightreign Scholar Guide - How to play Scholar in Nightreign (The Forsaken Hollows DLC)
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be taking a look at the Scholar Nightfarer. This is one of the two new classes added with the Forsaken Hollows' DLC. In this video, we'll be covering his stats, skills, recommended reclics, weapons to look out for, and how to use his effectively in your group. So if you're planning on taking the new DLC content or the base game with Scholar, you're going to want to watch this video.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
